import { Link, useLoaderData } from 'react-router-dom' import { useState } from "react" const SmallCardTeam = () => { const filtraLeagues = [] const leagues = [] const [statoSelect, changeSelect] = useState('tutti') return( <>
INSERIRE FILTRI PER NOME E PER NAZIONE E TORNEO
{statoSelect !== 'tutti' ? filtraLeagues.map( lega =>
{/*

*/}

{lega.league.name}

{lega.country.name}
{lega.country.name}
) : leagues.map( lega =>

{lega.league.name}

{/*

*/}
{lega.country.name}
{/*

) }
)}; export default SmallCardTeam;
